description:
Connect your devices into a secure WireGuardÂ®-based overlay network with SSO, MFA and granular access controls.

NetBird combines a configuration-free peer-to-peer private network and a centralized access control system in a single platform, making it easy to create secure private networks for your organization or home.
Connect. NetBird creates a WireGuard-based overlay network that automatically connects your machines over an encrypted tunnel, leaving behind the hassle of opening ports, complex firewall rules, VPN gateways, and so forth.
Secure. NetBird enables secure remote access by applying granular access policies while allowing you to manage them intuitively from a single place. Works universally on any infrastructure.
What's Changed
- [management] Fix add peer all group network map update by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2830
- [misc] Avoid failing all other matrix tests if one fails by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2839
- [client] Fix cached device flow oauth by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2833
- [management] Fix network map update on peer validation by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2849
- [client] Use the prerouting chain to mark for masquerading to support older systems by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2808
- [relay-server] Use X-Real-IP in case of reverse proxy by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2848
- [client] Exclude split default route ip addresses from anonymization by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2853
- [management] Enforce max conn of 1 for sqlite setups by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2855
- [management] Fix potential panic on inactivity expiration log message by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2854
- [management] Add benchmark tests to get account with claims by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2761
- [client] Use offload in WireGuard bind receiver by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2815
- [management] Remove context from database calls by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2863
- [management] Add peer lock to grpc server by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2859
- [management] Fix api error message typo peers_group by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2862
- [client] Remove loop after route calculation by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2856
- [client] fix/proxy close by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2873
- [client] Fix race conditions by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2869
Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.31.0...v0.31.1
